name: Hackysack City
description:
Welcome to Hackysack City

The goal is to get as many points as you can by placing coloured buildings next to each other and the same buildings on top of each other

Drag left and right to rotate
The next building is automatically released every few seconds and travels down the row but stops at the second road

Only 5 of the same building can be stacked on top of each other

If you place a building outside of the world it's game over

Hold and release to start

Made in 48 hours for the Shenanijam 2019

Music from https://filmmusic.io 'Fuzzball Parade' by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
